com.github.fge.largetext.load

Class TextLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.largetext.load.TextLoader

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class TextLoader
extends Object
    A thread-safe, concurrent-friendly loader of CharBuffers from a large text file

    This class will load character sequences from a large text file as described by TextRange instances (which are produced by a TextLoader instance).

    This uses Guava's LoadingCache to do the job. The default expiry policy (not configurable at the moment) is to expire entries 30 seconds after they were last accessed.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public CharBuffer load(TextRange textRange)
        Load one buffer matching a TextRange

        Note that it calls LoadingCache.getUnchecked(Object); therefore all loading failures will throw an unchecked exception.

        Parameters:
        textRange - the text range
        Returns:
        the matching CharBuffer

      • loadAll

        public Map<TextRange,CharBuffer> loadAll(Iterable<TextRange> ranges)
        Return a map of buffers from a series of text ranges

        The map entries will be ordered the same way as ranges appear in the supplied Iterable. Keys of the map will be ranges and values will be the loaded CharBuffers.

        Parameters:
        ranges - the iterable of ranges
        Returns:
        the matching map

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
